author: ryanleeschneider
content: Which existing testnets are _likely_ (I know nothing is decided yet) to exist after the merge?  My gut says Goerli and Sepolia but wondering if there's been any discussions on the topic yet.

author: timbeiko
content: I think Ropsten is still up in the air: at the very least I think we should transition it to PoS, but possibly we don't maintain it after that. Unsure what the Kovan situation is, but I've heard xDAI might be maintaining it
